page.title: 05HEALTH,WARGRAVE & DISTRICT
page.content: {Dr.Sandra Swan}is one of three medical practitioners in a joint practice at a surgery in Wargrave.They provide health care from 2 branch surgeries in neighbouring villages.The doctors are supported by District Nurses,Health Visitors and surgery staff.Dr.Swan chose to be a village doctor because she and her family like living in the country.Many patients like to consult a woman doctor & although there are more men doctors in the UK,in recent years more women are qualifying. { {A Welfare Officer}is employed by the local education authority to visit all schools regularly.School children are examined in school when the{School {Doctor and School Nurse}visit. { {A Welfare Helper}provides supervision during playtime for a handicapped boy.
